item.description:
AOACT Meeting
09/15/10. 7:00 to 9:00 pm
Comfort Inn. 900 East Main St. Meriden, CT
FREE for AOA and CTREIA Members | $30 for non-members

Learn from and network with other Apartment Owners and Landlords in Connecticut

Topics:
• Run It Like A Business
• Discover Hassle Free Property Management
• Building Inspections... The 30 Minute version that could save you thousands of dollars
• Building and Fire Marsh Codes
• 99.9 Eviction Free - If you Only knew
• Yes... You can buy apartments with little or NO money down

To learn more and/or register for this event, visit: www.ctreia.com/events.php

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Apartment Owners Association Of Connecticut
